attributes.title: i have permanent brain damage 😩😓🧠🍊✨
attributes.review: me, being a die-hard conservative😍 installed this app cause i am the biggest fan of our wonderful president mr donald trump 🇺🇸 after waiting 3 years for this app to install, it finally did. while it was installing though, i watched the movie parasite 🦠 🧬 even though i know trumpie is disgusted by how it stole all the american awards 🎥  anyways, right when the app installed, my screen started flashing and i heard trump himself saying “i know what you did🧐🤬” i got so shocked🤭 and scared so i went and worshiped my trump flag, begging him to forgive me for watching parasite. the next morning, i woke up and ran to the toilet immediately. i had extremely severe diarrhea and had to go to the hospital. the doctors said that i was infected by a strange parasite called the cheeto virus. they said it spread to my brain, and i was now a snowflake libtard!!!! i realize that this app is just fake news by the left and it was a ploy by sleepy joe to give me brain damage and to leave me unable to vote for Donald trump. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever to be created
attributes.review: This app took days to download just to see an orange looking man pop up on the screen. This app is extremely confusing and unorganized. This app is dumb and overrated. DONT GET ITTTT!! Also, the app put a VIRUS on my phone every time I opened up my Chipotle app it sent me straight to the Trump app. I just want fooddddd!!

attributes.title: THE BIG CHEETO WONT DEFEAT US
attributes.review: By far the worst app I have ever downloaded.  Overall trash, took forever loading, I got several viruses from the app, and I severely regret ever downloading it. It contained comments that were racist, sexist, and homophobic. GEN Z WILL NOT BE DEFEATED BY THE GREAT TRUMPKIN.

attributes.title: Dump Trump
attributes.review: Almost forgot that trump is a racist, homophobic, perverted, incompetent moron who will get destroyed in November. Can’t wait till he gets what’s coming to him.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app causes my phone to slow down & overheat......1/5 stars.....Obama’s app was better

attributes.title: Performed very badly
attributes.review: Bad. Very bad. The worst app this country has ever seen.

attributes.userName: NO YOU CAN'T HAVE MY NAME
attributes.title: COMPLETELY UNUSABLE!!!!
attributes.review: PLEASE HELP THIS APP IS MAKING MY PHONE NOT WORK. I DON’T KNOW WHAT IS HAPPENING. I THINK IT IS STEALING ALL MY DATA!!!! I DO NOT CONSENT TO BEING SPIED ON. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! TOTALLY DISAPPOINTING

attributes.title: Not here because of tiktok
attributes.review: Please don’t let the gen z “tik tok” challenge make you think less of my comment, I was really interested in learning about trumps plan for re-election and was really disappointed. Views aside, the app crashed continuously for me and different tabs took forever to load. Experience was terrible, you’d think our president could create a better app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could give this stupid app 0 stars o would this is the worst app ever created I mean seriously the design is so very useless almost like the man who made this app
